attributes.background:
Benefit sanctions are imposed without the right to challenge the reasons why they are being imposed. This is punishment without due process and must end without delay. For fuller explanation see
www.eventsandissuesinternational.bravesites.com

rejection.details:
We cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/106813

You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
